title: About
text:
The Biodiversity Futures Lab is based at the Natural History Museum in London.
It has the following very clever people working there:

Professor Andy Purvis: Principal Investigator
Dr Adriana De Palma: Principal Investigator
Sara Contu: Biodiversity Data Supervisor
Izzi Strudwick: Project Coordinator
Dr Connor Duffin: Research Software Engineer
Patrick Walkden: PhD student
Justin Isip: PhD student

title: Biodiversity Futures Lab
text:
Welcome to the Biodiversity Futures Lab website! This is a work-in-progress and will be updated as we add content to it - bear with us!
This is a Quarto website.
To learn more about Quarto websites visit https://quarto.org/docs/websites.
